page.title: 07A TYPICAL SCHOOL DAY
page.content: 7.30a.m. Mum's alarm. She & Dad get up 7.45a.m.{Mum wakes us up.}I wash & clean teeth. Big brother and little sister get dressed. I get dressed. { I set table & clean my shoes. We all have{breakfast,}cereals & juice 8.30a.m. Dad goes to work in car, brother goes to school on bus.{I {wash and dry pots,}Mum cleans bathroom {8.50a.m. Sister & I arrive at school, taken by Mum in her car. {12.30p.m. I have packed lunch, sandwiches, crisps, cake, banana or apple. {3.10p.m. Home with Mum & sister in car Have light meal, then wash day's pots. 3.50p.m. Piano practice, about 40 min. 4.30p.m. Play outside. {6.30p.m. Set table & have tea. 7.15p.m. Piano practice(?), television {8.30p.m. Bath. 9p.m. Bed. 9.20p.m. Go to sleep.
